title: 如何获取玩家的背包
txt_content:
如何获取玩家的背包，API文档里有getInventory和getOpenInventory
我想的是直接获取玩家背包的Inventory 求助 谢谢

replies.author: William_Shi
replies.txt_content:
直接获取玩家背包的Inventory 
getInventory就是玩家的背包

replies.author: Galaxy_233
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Galaxy_233 于 2020-8-9 15:55 编辑 

Player#getInventory
getOpenInventory可能是获取正在查看的容器(猜测 我没看doc

replies.author: 美年达呀
replies.txt_content: 直接获取指定用户的背包 Bukkit.getPlayer(UUID/PlayerName).getInventory();

replies.author: William_Shi
replies.txt_content:
Galaxy_233 发表于 2020-8-7 15:59
Player#getInventory
getOpenInventory可能是获取正在查看的容器(猜测 我没看wiki
不用猜测，就是正在查看的容器
https://bukkit.windit.net/javado ... html#getInventory--
https://bukkit.windit.net/javado ... #getOpenInventory--

William_Shi 发表于 2020-8-7 17:59
不用猜测，就是正在查看的容器
https://bukkit.windit.net/javadoc/org/bukkit/entity/HumanEntity.html# ...
感谢大佬的回复

replies.author: 利姆露酱
replies.txt_content: Player#getInventory返回的就是玩家背包实例，
